label: Submission: Pricing Template must be completed and submitted as Attachment No. 2
Submission: Offeror must complete and submit required blocks in referenced solicitation provisions.
quote: The offeror is cautioned that the listed provisions may include blocks that must be completed by the offeror and submitted with its quotation or offer.

label: Submission: Offeror may identify provision by paragraph identifier and provide appropriate information instead of submitting full text.
quote: In lieu of submitting the full text of those provisions, the offeror may identify the provision by paragraph identifier and provide the appropriate information with its quotation or offer.

label: Eligibility & Set-Asides: Offeror must certify that it does not conduct any restricted business operations in Sudan.
quote: By submission of its offer, the offeror certifies that the offeror does not conduct any restricted business operations in Sudan.

label: Flowdowns & Subcontracting: Large business offerors shall submit a subcontracting plan as part of their initial proposal.
quote: As part of its initial proposal, each large business offeror shall submit a subcontracting plan, as prescribed in FAR 52.219-9 (ALT II).

label: Flowdowns & Subcontracting: Subcontracting plans must contain all elements included in the outline in Section J.
quote: plans must contain all elements included in the outline.
